text: Allah yamanuye inkuru nziza kurusha izindi; ari cyo gitabo (Qur’an) gifite imirongo yuzuzanya kandi yisubiramo (itarambirana), ituma impu z’abatinya Nyagasani wabo zikangarana (iyo bayumvise isomwa), hanyuma impu n’imitima byabo bikoroha bigasingiza Allah. Uwo ni wo muyoboro wa Allah ayoboresha uwo ashaka; kandi uwo Allah yarekeye mu buyobe ntiyagira uwamuyobora
